column4: Does anyone have experience installing BURG over GRUB on a system that dual-boots 12.04 and Windows?
Yes. What would you like to know?
Uh, how to install it?
I tried doing it earlier and sudo burg-emu gave me a grub prompt
I installed it from the PPA, along with Super Boot Manager to set it up
Seeing as how I'm an ubu-noob, care to walk me through that?
One sec
http://www.overclock.net/t/1251224/guide-installing-burg-and-super-boot-manager-in-ubuntu-inc-12-04-lts
I still get a grub prompt when I do burg-emu
did you follow all the steps in the article?
added the PPA (well, I did earlier), updated, installed (both were already installed), installed to /dev/sda, no errors reported
imgur.com/VLK1i
gah, silly link highlight
http://imgur.com/VLK1i
that's BURG not GRUB
yes, but shouldn't I be seeing a visual window?
Just use SBM to finish the installation and choose a theme
you haven't finished installing it yet
oh.
Irish.
Follow the article from step 3
well, american
but my mom's mostly irish
the repo in the latter half of step 5 is already checked and listed as being precise, should I skip it?
